pages.text: Hello, $(playername) and welcome to the Elemental Guide!$(br2)As you may have already read on the landing page, this book will help you on your journey!
This mod adds amulets - powerful necklaces that grant their holder cool abilities!$(br2)Fire-resistance, jump-boost, speed-boost, pacifying, healing, etc...
Also it adds something mysterious to your world... $(br)But you will learn about it later
